title: Rationality Rules' Crying Game Moment with Jonathan Pageau: Super-thing Theism Debunked!
description:
Stephen Woodford and Jonathan Pageau had a conversation. It frustrated a lot of people because they struggled to get beyond their very different foundational approaches to the world. The highlight of the conversation was when Woodford discovers something about theism, that is isn't what he thought it was. If he can build from this point they might have a more productive conversation moving forward.

Conversation on Pageau's Channel https://youtu.be/D2Sdas8_c04
Conversation on RR https://youtu.be/CsqVRauiAn4
